verses.roman:
tabe ta' nagare ha-ibe svacchande kīrtana
śuni' saba mleccha āsi' kaila nivedana

synonyms: tabe ta'-thereafter; nagare—in the city; ha-ibe—there would be; svacchande—without disturbance or anxiety; kīrtana—congregational chanting; śuni',—hearing this; saba—all; mleccha—meat-eaters; āsi'-coming; kaila—submitted; nivedana—petition.
translation: "Then all the meat-eaters, hearing that there would be unrestricted congregational chanting in the city, came to submit a petition.
